pullRequest.title: Fix Blob Batch Failing when using AAD
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #8644
This PR resolves an issue where a Blob batch operation would fail when using AAD for authorization. This was due to the body failing to write into the batch operation request before being finalized.

commit.message: Fixed issue where using AAD would cause a batch to fail

nodes.bodyText: Can you leave a comment about how this behavior is safer and resolves the issue in question so we have some context in case we ever have to investigate it later?

commit.message: Add explanation for why Mono.when is safe to use and resolves the issue
